title: WAR POSTER ID
content:
Hello Font genius’,  
Please can you help me with the id of these fonts?

Thanks so much

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090330100043im_/http:/typophile.com/cms/files/mdwp020s_3575.jpg)

 [‹ Please help in finding this font:](http://web.archive.org/web/20090330100043/http:/typophile.com/cms/node/56295 "Go to previous forum topic") [Orphan trailer serif ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20090330100043/http:/typophile.com/cms/node/56279 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sirjamesoflondon

comments.content:
Hi Jimmy,

most likely, these are not fonts, but hand-rendered letters.  
For a digital font similar to ‘INVEST’, check out [Prenton Ultracondensed Bold](http://web.archive.org/web/20090330100043/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/blhd/prenton-rp/ultra-cond-bold/) by [Roy Preston](http://web.archive.org/web/20090330100043/http:/typophile.com/cms/wiki/Roy%252BPreston) – it has that open ‘S’ with vertical terminals. Also: [Gill Sans Bold Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20090330100043/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/monotype/gill_sans_adobe_std_bold_condensed/&sample_text=INVEST).  
F
